basics.name: Robert Maye
basics.label: Machine Learning Engineer & Researcher
basics.summary: An advanced computing specialist focusing on natural language processing, vector search, and conversational AI, currently pursuing an MSc in Advanced Computing at Imperial College London, with a focus on cognitive architectures and multi-agent systems.

location.address: Imperial College London, Department of Computing

work.name: Aurelio
work.summary: Specializing in integrating search, NLP, and conversational AI to transform the interaction paradigm with information.

awards.title: Winner of the National App Development Competition
awards.summary: Awarded for developing 'Kognition', an interactive classroom tool.

projects.name: HoloTutor
projects.summary: Development of an AI-powered tutor during Anthropic hackathon.
highlights: Implemented a proof of concept for educational use
